value.title: New Power BI Experience in Microsoft Teams
value.excerpt: During this session, we will be talking about the new Power BI experience in Microsoft Teams. During Ignite 2020, Microsoft announced a feature that, users can use Power BI Service from teams without leaving the context of Teams.   This feature is very useful for modern workspace users where we can use

value.title: Power BI Tip - Display Selected Item from the Slicer to the Slicer Header
value.excerpt: In this video we will talk about how we can display the selected item from the slicer to the slicer header. value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can hide the Filter Pane from the published version of the Power BI report. Sometimes there are situations in which we have set our Visual, Page or Report level filter as a part of development logic and we wish that end user should not able to change those values.

value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard

value.title: 3 ways to embed Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will look at three ways that you can embed Power BI into your website or application. This includes the Publish to Web feature, using the REST APIs and the new Power BI Embedded service within Microsoft Azure.  Watch the behind the scenes video over on Guy in a Cube - https://youtu.be/OqbVZfFhEzA

value.title: 3 ways to try Power BI
value.excerpt: Are you wanting to try Power BI, but not sure where to start? I look at some ways you can get up and running with Power BI quickly. value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
